website_summaries.verdict: A versatile blender that delivers commercial-grade performance at a more affordable price point than other Blendtec offerings.
pros: Features a 1,560-watt motor for high-powered blending that creates excellent smoothies and mixed drinks
Offers 5 incremental speed settings, as well as a Pulse function
Touchpad controls allow for easy cleaning
BPA-free jar has a vented latching lid
Has a Clean cycle for cleaning the jar, too
cons: Some users complain about how noisy it is
Air can sometimes get trapped around the blades and prevent even blending

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for Customer Warranty Service!  5 stars for manufacturing their product in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: After close to a year of nearly daily use (>500 cycles on the counter), the Jar developed an intermittent leak through the bottom seal. I submitted a Warranty Claim through Blendtec's user-friendly website and received a replacement Jar within about 10 business days. I would like to emphasize that this transpired HASSLE-FREE. This is how all companies should stand behind their warranties! In my opinion, this is a well-engineered, robustly constructed product. Blender Jar bottom seals are inherently a weak point - regardless of manufacturer. To their credit, Blendtec at least provides a long warranty period on their jars and blenders.
customer_reviews.author: Akthndlr

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I want so, so much to love this, but it just doesn't work well on frozen chunks of fruit. It constantly gets stuck. I have to stop it, take off the lid and move the frozen fruit around & start again. My family loves smoothies and I catch grief all the time because I'm the one who chose this one. I don't know if I got a dud or something, but I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi P

customer_reviews.title: No good product
customer_reviews.text: It shows “overloaded @, I read the directions how to reset it and doesn’t work, is late to return it, I bought it 3 months ago and doesn’t work anymore. Bad. I don’t know what to do. I will call the company customer service.
customer_reviews.author: olivia gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Lid was missing 😢
customer_reviews.text: Was very sad to see that the lid was missing, 😢, bought for my wife as a Christmas gift and have not been able to uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Patricio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Did not work straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. I was so excited to buy and use it. Product arrived promptly and I opened it. I tried to use the product for the first time and it didn't turn on and gave me an error that said "overload". I troubleshooted the product by following the directions given and it still doesn't work. I will be returning this expensive product that never worked. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: no support for this Blentec from Amazon purchase ,not working
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn't have to go manufacturer for that. Need more support from amazon. the Blender was sold as new but it was a deffective product. Apparently, the manufacturer was able to listen to the sound od the blender to figure out that the base of the container is deffective and sent a replacement and told me that the unit is brand new the seller should of replace the unit. It is a brand new one just by reading the serial number. I shouldn't have to go to all that trouble.Amazon used to be more supportive of customers because you are paying a membership to have a better service
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only used my Blendtec for smoothies, but I put in ice, apple chunks, kale & spinach leaves, etc. The shape design of the pitcher moves the contents around in a way that completely & thoroughly mixes it. The blunt blades do an incredible job of cutting everything down very quickly, and making a very smooth mix. Another great plus is that it cleans up super easy! I am impressed and very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: jbcrit

customer_reviews.title: perfect smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is amazing! Press the smooth button and let it do its thing. my old blender I had to stop and start multiple times, scrape and push the stuff around, down, keep adding more liquid until it was blended enough to eat. This blender avoids all that and just makes a perfect smoothie - never have to open and push things around! cleanup is easy- just put water and a drop of soap and run it - clean!
customer_reviews.author: oex

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it but......
customer_reviews.text: This product worked right out the box. It's a powerful blender. However, it came with a completely different Jar (a four-sided jar instead of the Wildside+ jar advertised). Had to return it because this would be my third return for the same issue. It has been frustrating to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: LARIN

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender for making smoothies! It’s probably amazing for many other purposes, but I bought it for making protein smoothies and so far I love it. It’s easy to use with a preset smoothie button, and it cleans up very quickly. I’ve ground rolled oats into flour in it, as well as ice, nuts, frozen fruit, and greens. It has made short work of all of these items. It doesn’t get ridiculously loud like my previous blender either. It’s a blender, so it makes some noise obviously, but nothing you feel like you need ear protection for and it blends so quickly, it’s over in a flash. It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personally prefer this to Vitamix.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Compared to the Vitamix I used to have, the base does shake a little more while blending, but I like that I can press one button and forget about it until it's done, instead of having to control the dial during the entire time it blends as required for Vitamix. The lid is also easier to secure on and off.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Daily user!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a nicer blender that would make smoothies and cooking easier. This blender is AMAZING! We make family smoothies almost every day and our old blenders would leave the seeds less than appealing for consumption...but this blender makes it so smooth that the seeds don’t bother anyone anymore. I even used this blender to make a butternut squash soup and it was smooth as butter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blender!
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought this blender some time ago and I had an opportunity to use it. My own blender had been a gift from another friend and it was pathetic compared to the Blendtec. I hesitated to spend the money to buy the Blendtec but eventually I took the leap. I have NO regrets. Granted, I use it exclusively for smoothies, but it produces a drink that tastes like a milk shake it is so smooth. I used my friend's Blendtec recently and noted she is close to 5,000 smoothies. The Wildside jar has tough blades that clearly last a long time. She often blends frozen fruit without any problem. I'm delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Grindahl

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t even blend my frozen strawberries. Would shake so bad I was afraid it was going to fall off base and super loud....like beyond the normal loudness if most blenders. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender, use it almost every day for smoothies. It has a self cleaning function which is great. It doesnt clean it completely but after than I just rinse it and lightly scrub with the soft side of a sponge. Idk what "sheerness" is but I love the blender so much I gave it 5 stars anyway. The blend isnt perfect. It doesnt quite get seeds and stuff but its still smoother than any other blender I have tried. (Maybe that is sheerness? idk). Anyway for what you pay I would say its definitely worth it. I expect this blender to last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted real blender for a long time (your typical Oster type blender never really works). Finally I have a blender with POWER. My kids have made smoothies EVERY day since i got it and i make "frozen coffees" like Chick-fil-a's. Just add your ingredients (make sure you have some liquid in there), push the smoothie button and let it go. A minute later- perfect. It is loud. That's the only draw back. And it has several buttons that they really dont explain what they're for. That's why i gave 4 stars for easy to use - only bc the other buttons could be explained better in the instructions. This was definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: christy-use this list!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value for money!
customer_reviews.text: I debated betwixt this and the Vitamix. I chose this blender because of the price point and the fact that the "blades" aren't sharp. I love that it's easy to use, easy to clean, and that it's made in the USA are all plusses for me. I made cashew coffee this morning (2 cups strong coffee, 28g raw unsalted cashews, 7 dates and a dash of cinnamon) and there were no "bits". I'll be making all sorts of concoctions with my new gadget!
customer_reviews.author: EXP01

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best mid range blender
customer_reviews.text: It smooths out all my crazy smoothie nonsense like seeds and such and blends everything to a silky consistency (unlike any of those $100 blenders i was using before which were always gritty). Plus there is a community of people who use this blender and ones like it similar to vitamix and other big brands. Seems to get the job done and you dont have to spend $100000000 (not to say this isnt expensive but this is about the price i would say is reasonable to pay for something that just works like this does)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I make smoothies every morning and this is my 5th blender in about 4 years. This is the best one so far, absolutely love it! My smoothies come out perfect and It is so easy to clean! Pay for a new one and don't waste your time on a refurbished one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: good blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender is definitely much better than the cheap like $30 one I had before. I make a smoothie bowl nearly every money, so it gets a lot of use. It blends fruit, spinach, and ice very well. We've even made soups a few time. That being said, it is a little hard to blend for one person. It takes a little finnessing. I'm going to look into getting a personal blending cup attachment for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this Blendtec and I wouldn’t trade it for any other blender. This is not your standard blender. It’s AMAZING!! The price is intimidating but it’s an investment and you’ll be so happy you did. I can make anything in this. Ice cream, protein shakes, hummus, anything! It blends ice in a couple of seconds. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: t10e

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Blender
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender, it is super loud, think Jamba Juice blender loud. Aside from the noise, it does everything I need it to do. I make acai bowls and almond butter with it regularly now and love how both turn out. Easy to clean, I usually just blend on med for a few seconds and then high. The clean setting is long and gets super loud again which doesn't seem necessary for what I use it for at least. Highly recommend, worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Aberasturi

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute the best blender we ever had. It is strong enough to make snow cones out of ice cubes. We love it for Margaritas. Plenty of power and strong blades.
customer_reviews.author: Obelix

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have had other blenders with many sharp blades that still did not perform half as well as this Blentec! The blunt blade at the bottom does incredible work. I like Kale in my smoothies and it is blended to perfection...no pieces or chunks of the leaf are present. Best Blender Ever!
customer_reviews.author: sdb_md

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY BLENTEC
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY BLENTEC!!! It took me awhile to finally decide between Blentec and the Vitamix. I went with the Blentec and couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Blender!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research we decided to go with the Blendtec Classic 575 Blender because of the quality of blending and the great price. Since we've purchased it we absolutely love it. We use it approximately once a day and haven't had any issues thus far. I definitely would purchase this blender again. It is very simple to use, has a lot of power, and one of the reasons we purchased it over competitor was because of the container size. It's one of the largest on the market for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, we use it almost daily for a nice healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: I like the blender. Good and powerful enough to make a quick snack or even a full breakfast. It's kinda noisy, but expected from such device. Cleaning is tricky: you have to make sure you clean it right after using it otherwise the cleaning process will require more effort. Once you get it, the whole process is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Lazutkina

customer_reviews.title: pretty but was not great
customer_reviews.text: just wanted to mention that this blender isnt really up to snuff. the jar leaks all over the place while making smoothies. the jar was replaced once. then the system started over heating and smoking after three months of use just from blending frozen fruit. my wife makes a smoothie once or twice a day and this blender could not hang. we returned it and are back on the market
customer_reviews.author: Eric Faust

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain wildside jar!
customer_reviews.text: Avoid buying - does not contain the wildside jar listed (much smaller jar). Seems like a remanufactured product.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: This blender is Amazing!  Looks great and is very powerful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This blender is much more powerful than I had thought it would be. I have been using it for the perfect smoothies and creamy hummus. It is at a higher price-point, but you get what you pay for and the power and quality will more than pay for itself over the years. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Telhiard

customer_reviews.title: Cannot do what my old Vitamix could
customer_reviews.text: It is fine if you just want to make soups and smoothies--but then you could probably manage those with a much less pricey blender. And for thicker stuff like nut butter or frozen desserts, this is just a no-go.
customer_reviews.author: Catina

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I am very happy with the Blendtec blender.
customer_reviews.text: My old blender just couldn’t make smoothies easily. The Blentec, I just follow directions on the order in which to put the ingredients and press the smoothie switch. All done! Also, because of the design of the blade, I am no longer cutting my fingers when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Zeppy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid product. I had expected it to hold more than it actually does though.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Denise

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This blender is so easy to use and is quick to blend frozen fruit for smoothies. I haven't tried anything else in it yet, but it works great for what I initially bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews seemed good and I was excited about purchasing this blender. When it arrived, we plugged it in and absolutely nothing happened. Tried every plug in the kitchen and wiping the front panel as instructed but it was totally dead. Returned the blender and will order a Vitamix.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: The lid is not spill proof
customer_reviews.text: You would think for the amount paid you are buying a great product. the product is good however the lid is very flimsy and there is a lot of spilling... wish I could return this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Wildside jar description might be in error but blender is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once, using the self-cleaning function, and it was then I realized that I didn’t receive the Wildside jar as described. I was disappointed because this is the reason I selected this one. Fortunately, Amazon’s Customer Service Team is resolving this for me, and I suspect that the description is in error. Otherwise, just with this initial quick use, it seems to be a great, powerful blender with a very simple look that blends with decor.
customer_reviews.author: TADav

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best blender I've ever owned. Bought it to make blended food that could be put into my husband's feeding tube during his treatment for throat cancer. This blender helped get him through a very difficult time and made a huge difference in his healing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has all the power too be needed and if you clean it up right after use the auto clean settings work great. The only comment is the addition hole in the top could use a funnel.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Does what they say it does!
customer_reviews.text: Super product, exceptional price (just a tad over $200. when I bought it) I've burned out several blenders making smoothies, I doubt that I'll ever buy another blender! This thing is so powerful it's almost scary!
customer_reviews.author: generallyinterested

customer_reviews.title: it is of commercial quality.
customer_reviews.text: over all it is a great product and a pleasure to use. the only problem it was delivered to the wrong address I am thankful we have nice neighbors as they brought the product over to our house in the evening. Mean time it sat on their front porch for the world to see as people drove by that afternoon. Ugh!!! I might add the address label was correct just delivered to the wrong house.
customer_reviews.author: Al Shimondle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: been fighting my old blender for years, I finally caved and bought this one. It is very powerful, super easy to use. cleanup is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany W

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: At last, a blender strong enough to make a proper milkshake. We love it, and use it more often than we probably should. The self-cleaning feature could not be easier and leaves no excuse for it ever being dirty. If it ever breaks I’m getting another one right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Blender
customer_reviews.text: Takes the hardest ice cubes and effortlessly blends. I like the fact the blades are not laser sharp (like a Ninja), safe to handle and easy to clean too .
customer_reviews.author: Todd Rothe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is powerful,easy to use and clean. It is loud, but fast. Design is beautiful and functional. Only made smoothies which are fantastic. Going to try soup next. It does everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG It is loud
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's broken or if this is the way it supposed to be but once I turned it on it was so loud That no one in the kitchen could hear themselves speak while the blender was working. If there was a quieter model I would definitely give it 4-5 stars
customer_reviews.author: roey kuc

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! A bit noisy. Has cleaning setting that actually does (clean)!
customer_reviews.author: Cavs

customer_reviews.title: Simply fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these and I LOVE them! 1 was lost in a housefire. I HIGHLY recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: love this blender
customer_reviews.text: very efficient, nice look on the counter, love the washing feature , blends really well, even frozen fruit
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender for smoothies and I am really impressed with the quality of it. Ingredients get processes quickly and the parts are very easy to clean. It is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gallinucci-Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I use it many times per day.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Summers

customer_reviews.title: You don’t have to pay an outrageous price to have a high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product mainly for making smoothies in the morning with quick and easy cleanup. However, our kids came into town and showed us several different ways to use it-ex: making oat flour. Quality product and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deena Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine only realized much later that the rubber lid has to be pushed and held down not to leak
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think you could blend bricks in this machine. ...
customer_reviews.text: I think you could blend bricks in this machine. Very powerful. Just make sure you hang onto the lid or you'll decorate your ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: It will blend it.
customer_reviews.text: First quality blender I have bought, wish I would have bought one way sooner, blends better, cleans easier, at $200, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: COG

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Quality Blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender is worth the high price. It is a versatile machine that does many things inexpensive blenders can't do, such as completely blend salad greens to a smooth consistency. It can also be used to make soups as well as blend nuts and other hard substances. The only drawback is that it is very noisy, which can disturb neighbors if you live in an apartment or condo. Overall, I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best blender ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I had the ninja before and cut myself multiple times on the blades! The Blendtec not only has more power and blends smoother, it also isn’t a safety hazard for me or my kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: Lid allowed liquid to come out the top. Called Blendtec and they sent me two new lids at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Meems 58

customer_reviews.title: Very bed
customer_reviews.text: It's not good products I use for one month and its broke its not even worth for money I can buy any other don't west your money on this
customer_reviews.author: jigarjshah

customer_reviews.title: The blender of your dreams
customer_reviews.text: Love love love our new blender. It was definitely time for an upgrade, and we haven’t had any second thoughts. This blender is easy to use, easy to clean, and it blends like.a.dream.
customer_reviews.author: K Olson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I want this blender for long time ,the price been too much . Happy to got good deal here . Very easy to use and clean .
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Best in every way
customer_reviews.text: Loved the large container, super power & speed & ease of cleanup. Best blender ever
customer_reviews.author: Conni Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and was excited once I received it but it was missing parts so I couldn't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this blender
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute worst blender I have ever used. Everytime I try making a smoothie, it stops working. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ohmann

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but loud
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. It does an amazing job breaking everything down. I just wish it was a bit quieter at full power
customer_reviews.author: McHeggJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender!
customer_reviews.text: Love the power! We have smoothies almost every day. Cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: vickieg

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best blender we have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Not good for blending frozen fruits
customer_reviews.text: Did not blend frozen fruit for smoothies well at all. Requires a lot of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McPartlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Green Smoothies are our current "thing" and it's a pleasure to use and clean the blender - though it is noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid sucks
customer_reviews.text: Great blender!! Just dislike how the lid is hard to put on
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Blue

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on cheap blenders. Get this!
customer_reviews.text: I have ALWAYS wanted to own a good blender. Over the years I purchased many $100 blenders only to have them suck or break. Trust me, I wish I would have just bought this blender 15 years ago it would have saved me time and money. This blender is amazing and it has become a permanent fixture on our counter because it is used almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ohana Films

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Color is fun! Tho it can heat up with tough blending.
customer_reviews.author: Madre

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Who drops 4 hundy on a blender that looks like it's a 1950's New Mexico flea market reject? With all due apologies to New Mexico and flea marketers, smart people, that's who. If you want a real smoothie sell your stupid beanie babies and invest in your health. If you want lumpy cold garbage drinks, buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: mlb

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Even went to the website to see how ...
customer_reviews.text: when I went to turn it on it would not work. There was no manual in the box and the product was bought new not refurbished. Very disappointed. Even went to the website to see how to use it to find out that it was indeed broken.
customer_reviews.author: giants

customer_reviews.title: Quality of refurbished units questionable
customer_reviews.text: Quality of refurbished units questionable . So I gave this as a gift to my sister. And she hasn’t got to make one smoothie. So disappointing. She kept getting an error message -overload error message. She had it for two days and is returning it to blendtec. They will of course replace it with a refurbished unit. Hope this one is more thoroughly tested before it sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Anne of Green Gables

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about buying American and maybe I was expecting too much but this blender just makes more work for me. It seems VERY well- made and I'm assuming would be great for the smoothie demographic but for a 5- year Paleo mom, this wastes more quality ingredients I use to make mayonnaise, dairy- free cream cheese, etc., than my cheap, $40 high- speed blender. For anybody who uses a blender for stuff that doesn't require constant scraping, it's definitely a 5- star blender. It just doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi498

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie time!
customer_reviews.text: After a dozen years of hard use I killed the used blendtech I loved...I got this to replace it...hoping it would work as well...and was impressed when it worked even better! That weird extra side (the wild side*) makes making smoothies (my main use) so smooth you would think your smoothie cake from a fancy shop! And it has a special cleaning function...you hit the button and it does a cleaning cycle...no guess work. So wonderful. I see myself enjoying daily smoothie perfection for a long time to come
customer_reviews.author: Seckmea

customer_reviews.title: Blendtec blender
customer_reviews.text: Works well but it is much louder and has more vibration under power than my vitamix and I own six of these and have had two of the six quit under warranty and although they were replaced, they should last longer and it takes time to get a replacement which is not good for my rentals.
customer_reviews.author: John Carver

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good customer service - mine arrived with a noisy bearing. Sounded like it was grinding even when operated without the jar installed. Called customer support and received a new base in about a week. There is a rubber seal in the jar that smells hot; a drop of olive oil seems to have solved that. Otherwise I’m happy with the power and performance! Smoothies are liquified and fruit circulates without needing to stir.
customer_reviews.author: berggbd

customer_reviews.title: noisy, VERY noisy!
customer_reviews.text: even with only water in it the thing sounds like I'm grinding up marbles, or parts of a manual transmission, it's terribly loud! having said that, it'll liquefy those marbles and transmission parts.
customer_reviews.author: Dave the Pear

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a "tough" blender to create smoothies. This thing is awesome. It can take whatever vegetable I toss in and it will blend it all to a very smooth mixture. I do cut the veggies into 1" or so chunks and then toss them into the blender. I've also used frozen fruits and veggies and the blender pulverizes them without a problem. If you are in to smoothies, this is the blender for you.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Engler

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I have had so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No issues, it is loud but powerful. My previously magic bullet, nutribullet, and some other knock off blendtec all stopped working or leaked. This will do what ever I want it to do. Little more than I wanted to spend, but definitely a solid blender that seems like it should last many years. I believe there is a 5 year warrenty
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My first impression is that this blender is amazing! I’ve had a Ninja Auto IQ that i thought blended well, but it doesn’t compare to the smoothness of the BLENDTEC. My smoothie included a whole orange with plenty of white still on and lots of ice among other things. It’s perfectly smooth with no iciness remaining at the bottom after drinking it with a straw.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerMom1

customer_reviews.title: Kicks butt!
customer_reviews.text: This device, with it's longer blender rotor makes my turbo Ninja look like a toy. It'll cut tough plant fibres down to nothing in seconds, with no motor hesitancy or stalling. As far as I can tell, it's worth every penny they asked for it. Great product. Maybe one of these days I'll try putting an old iPhone through it.
customer_reviews.author: Jambalaya Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: Love our Blendtec
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Blendtec for my husband's birthday. We use it every day and couple times in a day for healthy smoothies. I love it, no issues. It's now on it's 205 blend which includes the cleaning cycle. I usually give it a handwash before putting it through the clean cycle. Hope to keep using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fries

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily - came in a brown box
customer_reviews.text: The item I received looked like it was a return and while it looked good upon arrival, after after a few uses the jar was very difficult to get clean. I don't know if this was refurbished based on the box outside and it was also missing the warranty card. Amazon sent me an unfriendly email shortly thereafter about returning items and I believe it was related to this return. I'm going to take photos of all items I return moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Loved this blender at first but the motor burned out after just a few months. Must be a poor quality motor. Went to do a warranty claim on the blendtec website and still haven’t heard back. I wish I would have paid my hard earned money towards a vitamix
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Jar leaks after less than a month use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this very recently and the jar is leaking already! Less than a month of use. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: PEDRO ESPANA

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoothies and fits under the kitchen cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for longer than a month now, and I continue to LOVE my Blendtec. Smoothies are so much better than with my old blender, great consistency and just plain easy to use and clean. The WildSide container appears to work better than the Four Side version that my sister has with her Blendtec. The last thing that I really appreciate about the Blendtec is that it fits under my cabinets, a huge advantage over some of the other units.
customer_reviews.author: M. Le

customer_reviews.title: Blender won't make smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I got this high end blender to make smoothies, but it would not blend up frozen vegetables or fruit, and I always had a big chunk of frozen whatever at the bottom of my smoothy. In addition, the top did not fight tightly, and it would become lose and leak during blending. Didn't actually fly off, but only because I stood next to the blender with my hand on top.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my top kitchen tools.
customer_reviews.text: Can't think of any negatives. I am especially enjoying my kefir smoothies. I make batters, mill oatmeal, and whip up bullet coffee amongst many other things. I think I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: P. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: This ain't no salsa maker.
customer_reviews.text: This is a countertop, stump-grinding beast. It's basically good for one thing, liquifying. Loud, aggressive blending that could probably pulverize rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about my new blender. It works for smoothies, mixed drinks, soup, batters, and yes I have tried all of these. Don't wait another minute, if you are wanting to buy this blender, do right now! Hit the buy button and go for it, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B3player

customer_reviews.title: Its Blentec
customer_reviews.text: If you need a powerful blender that can tackle any diet required ingredients go for it! You won't regret. It stores the amount of times you use the Blentec so you can actually know your progress. It also has a clean mode that makes cleaning easy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cosi

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: This one is much better than the old one, my daughter loves the juices.
customer_reviews.author: joanchou1102

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: My new Blendtec blender just whipped up a delicious drink for my family using Brita water, soft fruit, then frozen bananas/peaches/blueberries, with a dash of vanilla. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I’ve bought in a long time
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing”more power oh ya” it’s nice to find a product that has this high of quality
customer_reviews.author: Johnmillersart

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Blendtec! It's so powerful and it doesn't have sharp edges that cut up my spatula. Blends things up just great except for Mijol Dates. They need to be soaked first to soften them up.
customer_reviews.author: songbird

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: Way better than our antique Oster model that requires earplugs to use. Blends smoothly and makes smoothies without difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. I like the color and seems like it’s well built.
customer_reviews.author: Laysea

product_meta.title: Blendtec Classic 575 Blender - WildSide+ Jar (90 oz) and Spoonula Spatula BUNDLE - Professional-Grade Power - Self-Cleaning - 4 Pre-programmed Cycles - 5-Speeds - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Black w/ Spoonula| Design:Blender

Every Blendtec is professional-grade with some of the most powerful motors in the industry, one of the longest warranties in the business, and fashion-forward industrial designs that look great on your countertop. Blendtec blenders are the most advanced blenders you can buy. Engineered and manufactured at our Headquarters in Orem, Utah.

Duplicate your favorite restaurant’s smoothies and mixed drinks at home! The Blendtec Classic 575, is the ultimate all-in-one appliance. Pre-programmed cycles make it easier than ever to create smoothies, salsas, hot soups, and more. Our unique clean cycle takes the work out of cleanup. 

The Blendtec Classic 575 offers two timed cycles that free your hands for other kitchen tasks. Simply press the 60 or 90-second setting and let your blender do the rest.

The Blendtec Classic 575’s five manual incremental speed cycles allow you to completely customize the consistency of your blend for the ultimate in customization or press the Pulse setting for a surge of blending power.
feature_bullets: Easy blending cycles 1-touch buttons 4 pre-programmed cycles pulse and 5 speed manual control with the ability to achieve a variety of textures Complete control to adjust your blending at any time while blending Lcd display shows blending cycle time remaining
No chopping prep save time and never a need to chop slice or dice in advance of blending
Patented blade/80% thicker stainless-steel forged blade with wings for amazingly smooth blends (10x stronger than other blender blades) note Blade is not sharp blade is dull No more cuts and pokes
Self-cleaning add a little soap and water your jar can clean itself in less than 1 minute
Large batches BPA-free Wild Side+ jar is a 90 ounce volume jar with 36 ounce blending capacity (wet or dry) ideal for blending beverages for 4-6 people
8 year /American company family-owned and driven to build the best quality products - without compromise Engineered and assembled in the USA
Electrical Ratings watt 1560 Volts 120 Hz 50-60 amp 13 cord 34inches/3 feet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars411 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
